item.title: Factor Based Analysis
item.description: In the previous two posts we learned how to download and clean the Fama French 3 factors data. In this post we will use those factors to analyze mutual funds performance. But before we proceed let us understand what Fama French factor model really is. The traditional asset pricing model (CAPM), used only one factor (Market returns) to explain the returns of a portfolio or a stock. Fama & French concluded that CAPM model was not sufficient to explain all the sources of returns for a portfolio.

item.title: Time Value of Money in R
item.description: In this article we will perform basic financial calculations in R. Calculating the Net Present Value (NPV) Financial problems such as valuing an asset can be solved by calculating its net present value. The underlying principle in the calculation is that a dollar today is worth more than a dollar a year from now. This principle was well known to our ancestors thousands of year ago.
